image.author: george7
image.post: Interesting position. Yes, I had in mind chin bandage and also, the Oviedo cloth. It would be interesting to see in the equvasion, along with these two cloths, Oviedo cloth.

image.post: Sorry Dan, I don’t use english as my primary language! I have been working with your parameters in Imagej (Fiji): 3D Surface Plo – grid 256 and etc. But, others parameters go as well 257, or 258… I wanted to say is, is there I chance to know what could be the best parameters on The Shroud? Thank you!
